overview:
Architect & builder of media/technology businesses in Asia-Pacific region.

Builds, runs, commercialises, acquires and sells digital media businesses in either hands-on executive roles or as an advisor to Boards and entrepreneurs.

Experience includes major web and mobile businesses across the mobile commerce, content monetisation, social network, automotive, fashion & beauty, food & lifestyle, communities & news and property sectors, as well as marketing & technology services businesses in the social technology, web development, search engine and agency space.

Has worked for media companies, technology companies, investment banks, from start ups to major listed companies.

Primarily focused on Asia Pacific region, but has worked on businesses around the world with interests, investments and clients in the US and UK. Based in Singapore and Sydney.
